sentences_examples.sentence_fr: On dit qu'il va neiger demain.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: It is said that it will snow tomorrow.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 每个人都有自己的缺点。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Měi gè rén dōu yǒu zìjǐ de quēdiǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tout le monde a ses propres défauts.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Everyone has their own shortcomings.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Mon oncle habite à Shanghai.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: My uncle lives in Shanghai.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 放心，我会照顾好自己的。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Fàngxīn, wǒ huì zhàogù hǎo zìjǐ de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ne t'inquiète pas, je prendrai soin de moi.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Don't worry, I will take care of myself.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il faut se brosser les dents matin et soir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You should brush your teeth morning and night.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Sais-tu utiliser des baguettes ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Can you use chopsticks?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā yǒu hěn gāo de jìshù shuǐpíng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a un niveau technique très élevé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He has a very high technical level.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他的工作得到了大家的认可。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā de gōngzuò dédào le dàjiā de rènkě.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Son travail a été reconnu par tout le monde.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His work has been recognized by everyone.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè zhāng zhàopiàn pāi de hěn hǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette photo est très bien prise.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This photo is very well taken.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tu dois avoir confiance en toi.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You must believe in yourself.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je suis très occupé ces derniers temps.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I've been very busy lately.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous avons les mêmes idées.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We have the same ideas.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les fans encouragent l'équipe.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The fans are cheering for the team.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī gè jǐnjí qíngkuàng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est une situation d'urgence.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is an emergency situation.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a immédiatement accepté.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He agreed immediately.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le travail acharné sera forcément récompensé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Hard work will inevitably be rewarded.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les nouveaux étudiants s'inscriront à l'école demain.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: New students will register at school tomorrow.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai déjà terminé la tâche.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I have already completed the task.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: En hiver, il faut utiliser une couverture épaisse.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: In winter, you need to use a thick blanket.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ hěn xiǎngniàn wǒ de gùxiāng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ma ville natale me manque beaucoup.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I miss my hometown very much.
